text.headline: Data Science & Research Intern AT CL Educate
text.text: After failing at multiple interviews, I finally cracked one at CL Educate , one of the prominent names in edtech space in India

text.headline: 1st Project
text.text: I was lucky to directly get their sales data to do diagonostic analysis and draw insights about product performance, lead conversion of each product & overall sales trend

text.headline: 2nd Project
text.text: I got a chance to do Literature Survey on Automatic Video Interviewing, collect Data, get it labelled from HR experts & then build a Prediction Model for Communication Scores & Overall Hireability from those recorded video interviews. Also secured National Runners-Up position in EvueMe-WAIN Innovation Challenge.

text.headline: Remote Data Science & Research Internship at EvueMe
text.text: I was fortunate to get included in their core team responsible for building a virtual hiring platform.

text.headline: Joined Myupchar as a Full Stack Ruby on Rails Developer
text.text: Amidst all the chaos due to Covid's 1st wave in India, I joined a healthcare based Indian startup called Myupchar as a Ruby on Rails Developer.

text.headline: Projects: Stock Check & Prescription Generation
text.text: built various modules like checking medicine stocks across various sellers & integrate it with order handling and prescription generation for doctor consultancy service.

text.headline: Joined Experience as a Level-2 Backend ROR Developer
text.text: I managed to get into Experience, a US based company which superenhances not only visibility but overall online experience of clients worldwide in terms of their reputation, customer & employees.

text.headline: Project 1 - Hiererachy Uploader
text.text: This involved building an API for bulk uploading data and populating it in a multilevel tier and user hierarchy which made the onboarding and intra-inter level movement of employees of our client companies easier.

text.headline: Project 2 - Filtering & Reporting of Reviews
text.text: This involved building APIs for filtering by abusive reviews, ratings and hierarchy. I also worked on APIs for building hierarchy based reports on customer reviews.

text.headline: Preparing for Cloud Data Engineering Role
text.text: After trying my luck in full time business and freelancing for around 1 and a half year, I finally decided to heavily upskill myself into Data specialised skills and make my career out of it.
